page.title: 10ALMONDSBURY C/E SCHOOL.
page.content: The school has about 200 pupils.There are 6 classes with about 30 pupils in each class.There are 6 teachers,all female and 1 Headteacher who is male. None of the{teachers}lives in Almondsbury. The school has been {extended,}to make it larger.The pupils we interviewed thought that{maths}was the{best lesson}and English the{worst. Tests were on Fridays. Some children stayed at school for their dinner, and they had a choice of 2 menus.In the evenings the pupils{play}on the{greens and in the{lanes.}The most popular {games}are hopscotch, rounders and the 'A' Team. In one class only 2 families have no car, 18 pupils always come to school by car, 11 always walk, 4 use the car or walk.{Half}the class use the{bus. Half the parents have a{bike,}two thirds have{2 cars}or more.
